name: Howl
desc: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.

name: Inner Vitality
desc: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.

name: Firestorm
desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

name: Dispersion
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

name: Snowball
desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

name: Flesh Heap
desc: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

name: Ice Vortex
desc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range.

name: Ice Armor
desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

name: Dragon Tail
desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

name: God's Strength
desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
